verses.text: The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* also \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Appoint \w out|strong="H5414"\w* for you \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w*, whereof I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto you by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*:

That the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w* that \w killeth|strong="H5221"\w* \add any\add* \w person|strong="H5315"\w* \w unawares|strong="H7684"\w* \add and\add* \w unwittingly|strong="H1847"\w* may \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* thither: and they shall be your \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w* from the \w avenger|strong="H1350"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

And when he that doth \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* unto \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of those \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* at the \w entering|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and shall \w declare|strong="H1696"\w* his \w cause|strong="H1697"\w* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of that \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, they shall \w take|strong="H0622"\w* him into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* unto them, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* him a \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, that he may \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* among them.

And if the \w avenger|strong="H1350"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, then they shall not \w deliver|strong="H5462"\w* the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w* up into his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; because he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* \w unwittingly|strong="H1097"\w*, and \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* him not \w beforetime|strong="H8543"\w*.

And he shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in that \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, until he \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* for \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \add and\add* until the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* shall be in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: then shall the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto his own \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and unto his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, unto the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* from whence he \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*.

Â¶ And they \w appointed|strong="H6942"\w* \w Kedesh|strong="H6943"\w* in \w Galilee|strong="H1551"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, and \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and \w Kirjath-arba|strong="H7153"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, in the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.\f + \fr 20.7 \ft appointed: Heb. sanctified\f*

And on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* by \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w*, they \w assigned|strong="H5414"\w* \w Bezer|strong="H1221"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* upon the \w plain|strong="H4334"\w* out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, and \w Ramoth|strong="H7216"\w* in \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, and \w Golan|strong="H1474"\w* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.

These were the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4152"\w* for all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and for the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them, that whosoever \w killeth|strong="H5221"\w* \add any\add* \w person|strong="H5315"\w* at \w unawares|strong="H7684"\w* might \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* thither, and not \w die|strong="H4191"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w avenger|strong="H1350"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, until he \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*.
